div.em: Current conditions as of 24 Apr 07:15 am CDT

div.span: Scattered showers and thunderstorms, mainly between 4pm and 5pm. Widespread dense fog, mainly before 8am. Otherwise, increasing clouds, with a high near 69. Calm wind becoming south 5 to 9 mph in the morning. Chance of precipitation is 30%.
Scattered showers and thunderstorms, then showers likely after 1am. Cloudy, with a low around 54. South wind 5 to 7 mph becoming light and variable. Chance of precipitation is 70%.
Showers. High near 60. Northwest wind 7 to 14 mph, with gusts as high as 25 mph. Chance of precipitation is 80%.

div.div: Due to the Stay at Home and school closure order by the Governor, school will be closed through April 30.

li.a: Watch this space for important notifications.

h3.a: FFA at the Ice Cream Stand

p.b: Over the summer our FFA chapter worked several days in the Ice cream stand at the Sparta Shooting Complex. While working we would serve customers ice cream and there was also a smaller table with vegetables being sold. We served multiple flavors like mint chocolate chip, peach, chocolate, vanilla, and butter pecan. Working the ice cream stand helps us get money for future events in the FFA chapter. Thank you Randolph County Farm Bureau for this great fundraising opportunity.
Submitted by Olivia Carle, 2019-2020 Social Media Committee

a.aria-label: Read more about FFA at the Ice Cream Stand

div.p: School will be closed from March 17th until March 30th.
